mapper.sql: ASSET_ID, ASSET_TYPE, PLATENUMBER, MAKE, MODEL, VIN, YEAR, HARDWARE, LOCATION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, DEL
mapper.select:
select
from t_asset where true AND ASSET_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{assetId}),'%') AND ASSET_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{assetType}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_asset (ASSET_ID, ASSET_TYPE, PLATENUMBER, MAKE, MODEL, VIN, YEAR, HARDWARE, LOCATION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_ON, DEL) values (#{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{make,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hardware,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ASSET_ID,
ASSET_TYPE,
PLATENUMBER,
MAKE,
MODEL,
VIN,
YEAR,

LOCATION,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_ON,

mapper.update:
update t_asset
ASSET_TYPE = #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATENUMBER = #{platenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKE = #{make,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HARDWARE = #{hardware,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_ON = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ASSET_ID = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_asset set ASSET_TYPE = #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATENUMBER = #{platenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAKE = #{make,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIN = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HARDWARE = #{hardware,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_ON = #{createdOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEL = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ASSET_ID = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
